article: Sunshine Zoo is a nice place to visit. Walk from the South Gate, go  _  on, and you will find the Panda House. Pandas are  _  . They like eating  _  . To the north of the Panda House, you'll find the  _  . They are the kings of the animal world. Remember not to go near them because they are  _  . To the west of  _  Area, you will see lots of birds. They can make beautiful sounds. Go on and you will see the clever and  _  monkeys. To the east of the Monkeys' Forest, you will see the giraffes. The giraffe has a long  _  . It is the tallest animal on the earth . North-east of the giraffes there is a  _  . Cross it, and you will see the elephants. Their ears are  like  open fans.
